entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,458Chapters: 7/12Kudos: 651

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,515Chapters: 10/24Kudos: 202

Summary: “HALE! THIS ISN’T A MODELING GIG, STOP POSING AND THROW THE DAMN BALL!”And for just a second, Derek falters.Not visibly. Not enough for anyone else to notice. But Stiles sees it—the tiny twitch in his shoulder, the flick of his eyes toward the stands. He felt that. He heard him.Stiles grins, high on adrenaline and something he refuses to name.This? This is their thing. This is fine.And any other fluttery, ridiculous thought trying to take root in his chest?He shuts the door on it.Hard.Because he doesn’t like Derek.He can’t.It would be stupid. And dangerous. And asking for disaster.

entry.title: Like You Meant It
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,860Chapters: 3/18Kudos: 74

Summary: “Normal people don’t pin someone against a chair, whisper in their ear, then go suck face with someone else and offer to drive them home like it’s some kind of civic duty.”Derek’s jaw flexes.“You’re mad.”“No shit, I’m mad!”They’re at a stoplight now, and Stiles turns to face him fully, chest tight.“You can’t just keep doing this. Showing up. Leaving. Touching me and then pretending it didn’t happen. I’m not—” He breaks off.Derek watches him. Silent.“I’m not like you,” Stiles says quietly.Derek’s voice, when it comes, is low. “I know" OR the one where I accidentally posted this -while editing, so HYG

entry.title: Just A Bit Broken
entry.summary:
Author: stereksupremacy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,985Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Derek-The moment my eyes see Stiles I knew he was mine. Now it was just a matter of letting him see we were basically meant for each other. It shouldn't be too hard... Or will it? With too many obstacles between us, his brother included, is my love enough to win him over? They say love is hard, but how hard is too much? It doesn't matter. I will keep trying and trying even if it breaks me little by little. Stiles deserves love, and I will be the one to give it to him.Stiles-My life was turned upside down the day of my sixth-grade graduation. It's a subject we don't want to talk about. Ever. From there, things just got worse, so now. New town, new me. I won't let anyone close to me. Everyone in the end just hurts me and I don't think my heart, or my mental health can handle any more betrayals. So when Derek comes knocking on my cold, dead heart, I have to build higher and stronger walls. Because truth be told, I don't think I can keep saying no to him. But I have to. No matter how charming he is. Or how funny. Or how insanely hot he is. He'll just end up hurting me. Like him. The one who shall not be named. I'm not made for love. I learned that the hard way. Derek will have too as well.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,164Chapters: 16/38Kudos: 23

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,213Chapters: 7/19Kudos: 261

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.summary:
Author: Elizabeth1985

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,475Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 620

Summary: Life is getting unsteady in Beacon Hills. With Peter back from the dead, virgins being sacrificed, and an Alpha pack hot on their heels, it is so not the time to get caught up in a confused swirl of WTF with Derek Hale. Except Stiles can't sleep and Derek can help. In the same way the wolves can draw pain, they can share emotion, they can calm. Derek, against his better judgement, uses these supernatural skills to help Stiles sleep sans nightmares.But here's the thing... when you let the floodgates of emotion open, not everything stays where it should.

entry.title: Rumor Has It
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,725Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 185

Summary: He would later plead temporary insanity for the words that slipped out of his mouth one warm Friday morning.“Scott, I think I’m in love with Derek,” Stiles said — and immediately froze, horror dawning as the words left his lips, unbidden and absolutely unwanted.“What?” Scott blinked at him, wide-eyed. “Derek—like, Derek Hale?" He sucked in a sharp breath. “Our alpha?”Stiles almost whimpered, shame and regret flooding through him. “Please don’t tell anyone,” he begged, grabbing his best friend’s shoulders. “He’d kill me.”Scott’s expression softened with sympathy. “Dude, don’t worry. I’d never tell anyone.”Spoiler: that’s exactly what happens.

entry.title: How To Ruin Derek Hales Morning
entry.summary:
Author: LS_5Ever

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,662Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 264

Summary: “Okay, before anyone says anything,” Stiles said, stepping into the loft kitchen, “I didn’t ask for a rogue sprinkler system to attack me. It just happened. And, to be clear, I am a victim here.”Derek sighed, turning to look at the younger man, who was sporting a pair of sweatpants that hung dangerously low on his hips, and a Henley.Derek—who had been mid-sip of coffee—forgot how to swallow.The mug slammed onto the counter a beat too late. “Why are you—?”***Or, Stiles walks in wearing Derek’s clothes. Derek had a slight brain aneurysm

entry.title: DOUBLESPEAK & SUBTERFUGE
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,413Chapters: 9/18Kudos: 25

Summary: After a series of events are erased from public memory, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills Prep with a fractured reputation and a growing power. Meanwhile Scott is having trouble reconciling the pressure and expectations from his estranged fathers–Rafael–sudden return.As the school restructures and supernatural tensions rise, old alliances are tested, new leaders emerge, and hidden agendas begin to surface. With friendships strained and the political balance shifting, Stiles and Scott are drawn deeper into a world of rituals, legacy, and dangerous expectations. Stiles also begins training under a reluctant mentor when he uncovers truths about the past and his role in a future that others are quietly trying to shape.Meanwhile, forces inside and outside the school maneuver to gain control, and the line between protector and pawn begins to blur. When violence erupts and loyalties are tested, Stiles must decide who he is, who he stands with, and what he’s willing to become to survive what’s coming next.Some power is inherited. Some is stolen. But the most dangerous kind? The uncontrollable.
